author: djrtwo
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.4.0-beta.5` -- Serve It Up -- released!

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.4.0-beta.5

Thanks <@504202741933932544> for bringing up this very important p2p consideration that will help keep the Blobs flowing ğŸ™ 

This is non-breaking wrt the previous release so can be transparently upgraded on existing devnets
